name: Ultimate Gamblin' Night 2: Please don't make me say it
name_original: Ultimate Gamblin' Night 2: Please don't make me say it
description:
If you are playing in a browser and you get an error, refresh the page. If you are on an apple device, it is common for Ren'Py not to work in web. Try downloading it on a computer instead or open and close the browser.

The sequel to the game Ultimate Gamblin' Night!

Meet new characters, read more about the story of this world, and - most importantly - gamble! Approx 69.53125% bigger than the last game!

(No, I am not kidding.)

Have fun! There are six possible endings, read the "readme.txt" if you need to access them all.
